context: The word 'ajab' is the third-person singular present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'ajama'. It means 'he/she/it drives', 'he/she/it manages', 'he/she/it runs', or 'he/she/it conducts'. This verb can refer to driving vehicles, managing projects or affairs, running activities or games, or conducting various types of operations. The dictionary definition shows it relates to organizing and handling matters or business.
